extension.dc:title: Darwin Core Measurement or Facts
extension.name: MeasurementOrFacts
extension.dc:subject: dwc:Occurrence dwc:Event dwc:Taxon
extension.dc:description: Support for measurements or facts, allowing links to any type of Core.

property.name: measurementID
property.dc:description: An identifier for the MeasurementOrFact (information pertaining to measurements, facts, characteristics, or assertions). May be a global unique identifier or an identifier specific to the data set.

property.name: measurementType
property.dc:description: The nature of the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.
property.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a controlled vocabulary.

property.name: measurementValue
property.dc:description: The value of the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.

property.name: measurementAccuracy
property.dc:description: The description of the potential error associated with the measurementValue.

property.name: measurementUnit
property.dc:description: The units associated with the measurementValue.
property.comments: Recommended best practice is to use the International System of Units (SI).

property.name: measurementDeterminedDate
property.dc:description: The date on which the MeasurementOrFact was made.
property.comments: Recommended best practice is to use a date that conforms to ISO 8601-1:2019.
property.examples: `1963-03-08T14:07-0600` (8 Mar 1963 at 2:07pm in the time zone six hours earlier than UTC). `2009-02-20T08:40Z` (20 February 2009 8:40am UTC). `2018-08-29T15:19` (3:19pm local time on 29 August 2018). `1809-02-12` (some time during 12 February 1809). `1906-06` (some time in June 1906). `1971` (some time in the year 1971). `2007-03-01T13:00:00Z/2008-05-11T15:30:00Z` (some time during the interval between 1 March 2007 1pm UTC and 11 May 2008 3:30pm UTC). `1900/1909` (some time during the interval between the beginning of the year 1900 and the end of the year 1909). `2007-11-13/15` (some time in the interval between 13 November 2007 and 15 November 2007).

property.name: measurementDeterminedBy
property.dc:description: A list (concatenated and separated) of names of people, groups, or organizations who determined the value of the MeasurementOrFact.
property.comments: Recommended best practice is to separate the values in a list with space vertical bar space (` | `).

property.name: measurementMethod
property.dc:description: A description of or reference to (publication, URI) the method or protocol used to determine the measurement, fact, characteristic, or assertion.
property.examples: `minimum convex polygon around burrow entrances` (for a home range area). `barometric altimeter` (for an elevation).

property.name: measurementRemarks
property.dc:description: Comments or notes accompanying the MeasurementOrFact.
